title: The real victims of mass crypto-hacks that keep happening
description: Millions in Bitcoin and other digital coins are being stolen by hackers with victims left in limbo.
content:
By Joe TidyCyber reporter 
Taxi driver Chris is obsessively checking his phone for updates.
"I'm set to lose almost 2,500 euros (£2,100) worth of cryptocurrency coins," he says.
Chris describes hi… [+6584 chars]
